lcSingleSelect.lcQuestion: Assume that the following code snippet is in the reltable for the current map file and all of the referenced topics are also in the map file. The c_ prefix indicates concept topics and the r_ prefix indicates reference topics. What will be the result in the related topics sections?

lcAnswerOption.lcAnswerContent: A Related References section at the end of each of the topics.
For the reference topics, a link to the other reference topics and a link to the concept topic. For the concept topic, a link to both reference topics.
No more than one Related Concepts link and no more than one Related References link.
lcAnswerOption.lcFeedback: The concept topic will include references to both reference topics.
reltables let you avoid inline links.

lcAnswerOption.lcAnswerContent: One related concepts section in these topics.
